attributes.action: Make the refusal by vendors to supply goods to island postal residence illegal.
attributes.additional_details: Principles for free fare trade in UK reduce the level of financial burden for essential island communities
attributes.background: The UK is composed of over 30 inhabited islands, which supply essential goods and services to the UK economy and whilst the UK mainland can enjoy these products and services, the islanders themselves are unable to acquire goods from an increasing number of mainland distribution companies
